articles.author: Hilary Mitchell
articles.title: Seven key takeaways from Kevin Spacey's bombshell Piers Morgan interview - PinkNews
articles.description: Kevin Spacey gave a bombshell interview to journalist Piers Morgan on 11 June – and admitted he's "broke". Here's what else you need to know.
articles.content: Former House of Cards actor Kevin Spacey gave a bombshell 90-minute interview to British broadcaster and journalist Piers Morgan on Tuesday (11 June) about the accusations that brought about his dram… [+9375 chars]
